column1: Uchi////My first Uchi experience was take out during Covid. They canceled our reservation because they'd stopped serving indoors recently
column2: and so we had to order to-go. VERY STRONG 4.5 overall experience probably because I'd had high expectations
column3: but the food was delicious regardless. In my opinion
column5: the zero sen ($12.50) is a must. We tried eight fairly popular dishes
column6: and that was definitely our favorite.
